H0.text: Constantia, famous as a wine growing area, is a suburb of which South African city. Cape Town

H1.text: Constantia, famous as a wine growing area, is a suburb of which South African city. Stellenbosch

H2.text: Constantia, famous as a wine growing area, is a suburb of which South African city. Johannesburg

H3.text: Constantia, famous as a wine growing area, is a suburb of which South African city. IKapa

A4.text: Constantia and Bishopscourt in the Southern Suburbs; Tamboerskloof and Higgovale in the City Bowl; and Fresnaye, Camps Bay, Clifton, Llandudno, and Bantry Bay in the Atlantic Seaboard.

A5.text: Groot Constantia and Klein Constantia are notable wineries in the city
